manifest.name: Scribe
manifest.description: Record, transcribe, and transform voice notes into structured insights. Leverage Whisper or AssemblyAI and ChatGPT to fill in gaps, generate summaries, and visualize ideas — all seamlessly integrated within Obsidian.
manifest.author: Mike Alicea

data.manifestValue: Record, transcribe, and transform voice notes into structured insights. Leverage Whisper or AssemblyAI and ChatGPT to fill in gaps, generate summaries, and visualize ideas — all seamlessly integrated within Obsidian.
data.communityListValue: Record voice notes, Fill in lost thoughts, Transcribe the audio, Summarize & Visualize the text - All in one clip
